strings.name: Webové rozhraní API pro ASP.NET Core
strings.description: A project template for creating a RESTful Web API using ASP.NET Core controllers or minimal APIs, with optional support for OpenAPI and authentication.
strings.parameter.DisableOpenAPI.name: Povolit podporu _OpenAPI
strings.parameter.UseMinimalAPIs.name: Use controllers
strings.parameter.UseMinimalAPIs.description: Use controllers instead of minimal APIs.
